results.description: Combine recent revision speed and magnitude of est_eps to capture upward EPS revision momentum. Applied SUGGESTION1 by using two datafields (est_eps, anl4_afv4_eps_mean). SUGGESTION2 not applicable (no vector fields). Both fields have high user/alpha counts so SUGGESTION4 applied. Coverage >0.6 so ts_backfill not needed. Confidence 0.78.

Use short-term change in announced ebit vs its mean forecast to find earnings acceleration. Used anl4_ebit_value and anl4_ebit_mean (SUGGESTION1). High coverage and userCount => SUGGESTION4 applied. No vector fields. Confidence 0.74.

Long names with high stddev of ebit estimates (anl4_ebit_std) after positive mean revision. Used two fields (anl4_ebit_std, anl4_ebit_mean) per SUGGESTION1. Because anl4_ebit_std coverage ~0.47 (<0.6), applied ts_backfill per SUGGESTION3. SUGGESTION4 considered; anl4_ebit_mean has strong userCount. Confidence 0.62.

Capture companies where EBITDA rises but margins fall: use anl4_ebitda_value and gross_income_reported_value. SUGGESTION1 used. Both fields have decent coverage; no backfill required. SUGGESTION4 applied (high alphaCount for anl4_ebitda_value). Confidence 0.66.

results.idea: Free cash flow per share acceleration
results.description: Look for rising anl4_fcf_value relative to est_fcf (forecasts). Used two fields per SUGGESTION1. est_fcf coverage ~0.5777 (<0.6) so ts_backfill applied (SUGGESTION3). High userCount for anl4_fcf_value used (SUGGESTION4). Confidence 0.71.

Measure speed of analyst consensus EPS increase using anl4_afv4_eps_mean and anl4_afv4_minguidance to detect upgrades. SUGGESTION1 used. anl4_afv4_eps_mean coverage=1.0 so reliable. No vector fields. Confidence 0.69.

results.idea: Large guidance gap: guidance vs current reported EPS
results.description: Identify names where earnings_per_share_guidance_value deviates from anl4_epsr_value (reported). Used two fields (SUGGESTION1). earnings_per_share_guidance_value coverage=0.36 (<0.6) so ts_backfill applied (SUGGESTION3) to improve coverage. Confidence 0.60.

Long firms with falling anl4_netdebt_mean and rising free cash flow: use anl4_netdebt_mean and anl4_fcf_value. SUGGESTION1 applied. anl4_netdebt_mean coverage ~0.5156 (<0.6) -> ts_backfill used (SUGGESTION3). Confidence 0.65.

results.idea: Capex cut leading to EPS lift
results.description: Spot falls in anl4_capex_value while est_eps rises. Used two fields per SUGGESTION1. anl4_capex_value coverage ~0.6592 so no backfill. SUGGESTION4 applied to est_eps (high userCount). Confidence 0.58.

Trade names where actual_sales_value_annual outperforms est_sales. Two fields used (SUGGESTION1). est_sales coverage ~0.7458 high; actual_sales_value_annual coverage ~0.9943 high. No backfill needed. Confidence 0.72.

Use anl4_basicconqfv110_numest (number of forecasts) vs anl4_qfv4_dts_spe (EPS std dev) to find names with many analysts but high disagreement. SUGGESTION1 applied. Both fields have good counts; anl4_qfv4_dts_spe coverage 0.571 (<0.6) so ts_backfill applied. Confidence 0.55.

Track ts_delta(pretax_income_total) relative to its median estimate anl4_ptp_median. SUGGESTION1 used. pretax_income_total coverage high; anl4_ptp_median coverage ~0.7327. No backfill. Confidence 0.63.

Detect rising anl4_afv4_div_mean (dividend mean) vs dividend_estimate_median_value. SUGGESTION1 used. Coverage moderate; dividend_estimate_median_value coverage 0.6151 (>0.6) so no backfill. Confidence 0.52.

Find companies where est_sga falls while sales_estimate_average rises: two fields (SUGGESTION1). est_sga coverage ~0.5121 (<0.6) so ts_backfill used. SUGGESTION4 partially applied to sales_estimate_average (coverage 1.0). Confidence 0.57.

results.idea: Reported EPS reversion after large beat
results.description: Short names that had very large recent anl4_epsr_value zscore (mean reversion). Single-field idea but SUGGESTION1 lightly applied by pairing with ts_std_dev of recent returns for risk scaling. anl4_epsr_value coverage very high; used ts_zscore for outlier control. Confidence 0.59.

results.idea: High information ratio of EPS revisions
results.description: Compute ts_ir on est_eps revisions to find names with consistent revisions (low noise). SUGGESTION1 uses single field est_eps; SUGGESTION2 not applicable. est_eps coverage ~0.7848 so reliable. Confidence 0.68.

results.idea: Rising tangible book vs guidance (value tilt)
results.description: Compare est_tbv_ps and book_value_per_share_reported_value to spot improving tangible book. Two fields used (SUGGESTION1). est_tbv_ps coverage low (0.3473) -> ts_backfill applied (SUGGESTION3). Confidence 0.50.

results.idea: Pretax income stability (low std) with rising mean
results.description: Long names where anl4_ptp_median rises while anl4_dts_ptp (std) falls. Two fields per SUGGESTION1. Both have decent coverage; no backfill. SUGGESTION4 applied for using median. Confidence 0.61.
Favor stocks with many forecasts (anl4_qfv4_eps_number) that just revised up (ts_delta(est_eps)). Two-field combo per SUGGESTION1. anl4_qfv4_eps_number coverage 1.0 so robust. Confidence 0.67.

results.idea: Cash flow per share beat persistence
results.description: Use anl4_af_cfps_value (actual CFPS) vs anl4_qfv4_cfps_mean (forecast) to detect persistent CFPS beats. Two fields used. anl4_af_cfps_value coverage ~0.6156 (>0.6) so no backfill. Confidence 0.64.

results.idea: Rising adjusted net income vs forecasts
results.description: Measure ts_delta(net_income_adjusted) relative to est_netprofit_adj (forecasts). Two fields (SUGGESTION1). Both have good coverage; est_netprofit_adj coverage ~0.7731. Confidence 0.70.

results.idea: Rapid increase in number of 'buy' recommendations
results.description: Track anl4_buy count changes (anl4_buy) to spot momentum from analysts. Single-field, but paired with ts_zscore to control scale. anl4_buy coverage ~0.6243. SUGGESTION4 applied for its userCount. Confidence 0.53.
Signal when est_eps mean (est_eps) diverges from earnings_per_share_median_value: uses two fields per SUGGESTION1. earnings_per_share_median_value coverage=1.0 so reliable. Confidence 0.56.

results.idea: High reuse: consistent EBIT upward trend
results.description: Long names with positive long-term ts_delta(anl4_ebit_value, 365) scaled by ts_std_dev for stability assessment. Single-field approach (SUGGESTION1 minimal). anl4_ebit_value strong coverage and alphaCount (SUGGESTION4). Confidence 0.73.

results.idea: Guidance tightening: low dispersion and rising guidance
results.description: Find names where anl4_ebit_std falls while anl4_ebit_high guidance rises. Two fields used; anl4_ebit_std coverage <0.6 so ts_backfill applied. SUGGESTION4 used for guidance fields. Confidence 0.54.
Spot sales growth (ts_delta(est_sales, 180)) while capex remains flat (anl4_capex_value). Two fields SUGGESTION1. anl4_capex_value coverage ~0.6592 so OK. Confidence 0.60.

Compute ts_ir on est_cashflow_op to pick stable cashflow forecasters. Single field (est_cashflow) used; coverage ~0.6518 (>0.6) so SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4 applied for userCount. Confidence 0.66.
Short stocks showing strong negative ts_delta(est_eps,30) and falling anl4_afv4_eps_mean. Two fields (SUGGESTION1). Both fields have acceptable coverage; no backfill. Confidence 0.68.

results.idea: High forecast dispersion then mean reversion

Use anl4_ebitda_value and gross_income_reported_value to compute margin trend. SUGGESTION1 used. Both have decent coverage; no backfill. Confidence 0.70.

results.idea: Rising forecast count with low stddev
results.description: Favor stocks where anl4_tot_gw_ft (forecast type proxy) and anl4_qfv4_dts_spe show increasing count but falling dispersion. SUGGESTION1 used; dispersion field <0.6 coverage -> ts_backfill. Confidence 0.53.
Long where est_bookvalue_ps rises faster than est_tot_assets. Two fields (SUGGESTION1). est_bookvalue_ps coverage ~0.6751; est_tot_assets ~0.7522, so no backfill. Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: Earnings acceleration normalized by estimate volatility
results.description: Scale ts_delta(est_eps) by recent ts_std_dev(est_eps) to favor consistent accelerations. Single field per SUGGESTION1. est_eps coverage >0.6 so no backfill. Confidence 0.72.

results.idea: Reported pretax income momentum scaled by volatility
results.description: Use pretax_income_reported and its ts_std_dev to find stable upward movers. Single-field plus std scaling (SUGGESTION1). Coverage moderate; no backfill. Confidence 0.60.
Track anl4_ady_pu (number of upper estimations) increases as bullish signal. Single field; coverage ~0.7196 (>0.6). SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.55.

Combine net_income_adjusted increase with falling anl4_netprofita_std (less forecast noise). Two fields; anl4_netprofita_std coverage ~0.5041 <0.6 so ts_backfill applied. Confidence 0.62.
Use free_cash_flow_total and sales_estimate_average to find FCF margin expansion. Two fields used; sales_estimate_average coverage 1.0. free_cash_flow_total coverage ~0.6822. Confidence 0.59.

Use anl4_mark (recommendation consensus) trend to capture improving sentiment. Single-field; coverage ~0.6243 and good userCount so SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.57.

Use est_ffo (mean forecasts) rising and falling min_adjusted_funds_from_operations_guidance to detect positive surprises. Two fields; est_ffo coverage low (0.0411) -> ts_backfill applied but low confidence. Confidence 0.42.

results.idea: Net profit up while debt decreases
results.description: Long where anl4_netprofit_value rises and net_debt_actual_value falls. Two fields used; net_debt_actual_value coverage ~0.3883 (<0.6) so ts_backfill applied. Confidence 0.60.

Compare est_eps to earnings_per_share_median_value and rank acceleration. Two fields used; median coverage 1.0. Confidence 0.66.

results.description: Track operating_profit_before_interest_tax ts_delta to spot fundamental profit increases. Single field; coverage high (0.9274). SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.72.

results.description: Combine gross_income_reported_value rise and total_goodwill_actual_value decline as efficiency signal. Two fields; goodwill coverage ~0.3761 -> ts_backfill applied. Confidence 0.48.

results.description: Scale est_eps momentum by anl4_basicconqfv110_numest (number of forecasts) to favor consensus-backed moves. Two fields used; numest coverage ~0.7262 good. Confidence 0.68.
Compare est_cashflow_fin (mean) rising vs financing_cashflow_reported_value falling to find deleveraging. Two fields; est_cashflow_fin coverage ~0.6205 (>0.6). Confidence 0.62.

Use ts_sum of actual_sales_value_quarterly minus sales_estimate_maximum_quarterly across last 4 quarters to measure persistence. Two fields; both high coverage. Confidence 0.67.
